# File Schema Docs

- [Configuration file schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md): Learn more about: Configuration file schema for .NET Framework
- [<configuration> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/configuration-element.md): Learn more about: <configuration> element
- [<assemblyBinding> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/assemblybinding-element-for-configuration.md): Learn more about: <assemblyBinding> element for <configuration>
- [<linkedConfiguration> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/linkedconfiguration-element.md): Learn more about: <linkedConfiguration> element
- [<configSections> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/configsections-element-for-configuration.md): Learn more about: <configSections> element for <configuration>
- [<sectionGroup> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/sectiongroup-element-for-configsections.md): Learn more about: <sectionGroup> element for <configSections>
- [Custom Element for SingleTagSectionHandler](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/custom-element-1.md): Learn more about: Custom element for SingleTagSectionHandler
- [Custom Element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/custom-element-2.md): Learn more about: Custom element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler
- [<add> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/add-element-for-custom-2.md): Learn more about: <add> element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler
- [<clear> Element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/clear-element-for-custom-2.md): Learn more about: <clear> element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler
- [<remove> Element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/remove-element-for-custom-2.md): Learn more about: <remove> element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler
- [<section> Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/section-element.md): Learn more about: <section> element
- [Application Settings Schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/application-settings-schema.md): Learn more about: Application Settings schema
- [Configuration Sections Schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/configuration-sections-schema.md): Learn more about: Configuration sections schema
